item.title: Callouts
item.description: Callout support Quartz supports the same Admonition-callout syntax as Obsidian. This includes 12 Distinct callout types (each with several aliases) Collapsable callouts See documentation on supported types and syntax here.

item.title: Here & now
item.description: Focussing on health and exercising. Developing my technical knowledge on distributed systems, data engineering. Exploring self-hosting, web3 and investing. Writing at least one article per month on my topics of interest.
